title: Zachary Pill Dragon Magic: Book 1
description: Getting beat up by three boys is bad enough, but when a swarm of bats invade his Boston apartment and his father disappears, Zachary Pill's world spins out of control. After being forced to move to New Hampshire, he soon learns that cleaning Madame Kloochie's filthy house is the least of his problems. When the evil wizard Krage sends monsters to find him, Zachary has to find a way to defend himself and and his friends...and so begins his journey into the dangerous world of his family's magic.
author: Tim Greaton
